動物用藥品名稱: 禽必威雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎活毒疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣英特威動物藥品股份有限公司
地址: WIN DE KORVERSTRAAT 35 5831 AN BOXMEER, THE NETHERLAND
效能(適應症): 預防雞和雉雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎
ingredients: ACH VIAL CONTAINS PER DOSE AT LEAST 10^2.5 EID50 (EMBRYO INFECTIVE DOSE 50% ) OF THE SERVA  LARINGOVAC  VACCINE STRAIN OF INFECTIOUS LARYNGOTRACHEITIS VIRUS , WITH STABILIZERS ADDED. THE  CONTENT OF EACH VIAL IS LYOPHILIZED AND VACUUM PACKED.
